org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian

Class ScrollBarScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.input.KnobDragScrollerImpl
      • org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.KnobTrackScrollerImpl
        • org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.ScrollBarScroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Caret, org.jemmy.interfaces.Scroller

    public class ScrollBarScroller
extends KnobTrackScrollerImpl
    Scroller implementation which uses d'n'd of the knob of ScrollBar. Ported from the project JemmyFX, original class is org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.ScrollBarScroller
    Author:
    shura
